dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hahahahaha! Unbelievable. You are not serious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahahahaha! Unbelievable. You are not serious.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? What's so funny?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? What's so funny?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: This! One hundred and twenty-five kilograms, okay? Of mephedrone! And they get, what, uh, eleven years?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This! One hundred and twenty-five kilograms, okay? Of mephedrone! And they get, what, uh, eleven years?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two Latvian citizens have been sentenced in East Kazakhstan for producing 125 kilograms of mephedrone... the court sentenced each of them to 11 years in a medium-security facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, eleven years. For setting up an underground drug lab in, like, East Kazakhstan. What's the problem?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, eleven years. For setting up an underground drug lab in, like, East Kazakhstan. What's the problem?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two Latvian citizens have been sentenced in East Kazakhstan for producing 125 kilograms of mephedrone... with the aim of setting up an underground drug lab... the court sentenced each of them to 11 years in a medium-security facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The problem? I mean, that's a ton of drugs! That's practically a slap on the wrist for an "especially serious" crime, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The problem? I mean, that's a ton of drugs! That's practically a slap on the wrist for an especially serious crime, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The offence under Article 297-1, Part 3 of the Criminal Code is classified as especially serious and carries a punishment of 10 to 15 years of imprisonment,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A slap on the wrist? Are you actually, like, listening to yourself? They flew all the way from Riga specifically to produce this stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A slap on the wrist? Are you actually, like, listening to yourself? They flew all the way from Riga specifically to produce this stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the court, the men arrived in Ust-Kamenogorsk from Riga in the spring of 2024 with the aim of setting up an underground drug lab.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the article says they showed remorse! And they, uh, confessed. You'd think that would count for something, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the article says they showed remorse! And they, uh, confessed. You'd think that would count for something, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Their guilt was confirmed by forensic examinations, search results, covert investigative footage, and their own confessions. ... Despite both defendants expressing remorse and asking for the minimum sentence, the court sentenced each of them to 11 years in a medium-security facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, remorse. After the forensic exams, the search results, the covert footage... then they were remorseful. Please.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, remorse. After the forensic exams, the search results, the covert footage... then they were remorseful. Please.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Their guilt was confirmed by forensic examinations, search results, covert investigative footage, and their own confessions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Still! They confessed! They got almost the absolute minimum for an "especially serious" crime that carries up to fifteen years!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still! They confessed! They got almost the absolute minimum for an especially serious crime that carries up to fifteen years!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The offence under Article 297-1, Part 3 of the Criminal Code is classified as especially serious and carries a punishment of 10 to 15 years of imprisonment,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So you want them to get, like, twenty years? They're going to a medium-security facility for over a decade! That sounds pretty serious to me, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So you want them to get, like, twenty years? They're going to a medium-security facility for over a decade! That sounds pretty serious to me, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the court sentenced each of them to 11 years in a medium-security facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But they started this operation in the spring of this year! They only just got caught! How much more damage would they have done?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they started this operation in the spring of this year! They only just got caught! How much more damage would they have done?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the court, the men arrived in Ust-Kamenogorsk from Riga in the spring of 2024 with the aim of setting up an underground drug lab.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they didn't do more damage, did they? Because they got caught. And they got, uh, what they deserved.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they didn't do more damage, did they? Because they got caught. And they got, uh, what they deserved.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eleven years for 125 kilos of a dangerous synthetic drug, flying halfway across the world? That just doesn't add up for me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eleven years for one hundred twenty five kilos of a dangerous synthetic drug, flying halfway across the world? That just doesn't add up for me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: produced over 125 kilograms of mephedrone, a synthetic drug... the court sentenced each of them to 11 years in a medium-security facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It adds up perfectly! They committed a massive crime, like, in another country. What did you expect? A warning letter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It adds up perfectly! They committed a massive crime, like, in another country. What did you expect? A warning letter?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, I just, uh, I think the "especially serious" classification should mean more than just above the minimum. It sets a precedent, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I just, uh, I think the especially serious classification should mean more than just above the minimum. It sets a precedent, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The precedent is, don't fly to Kazakhstan to cook drugs. Simple as that. Eleven years is a pretty clear message.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The precedent is, don't fly to Kazakhstan to cook drugs. Simple as that. Eleven years is a pretty clear message.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, it just feels, like, low impact for such a high-volume operation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know, it just feels, like, low impact for such a high-volume operation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Low impact? Ask the people who got poisoned by that stuff if it's low impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Low impact? Ask the people who got poisoned by that stuff if it's low impact.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No "buts."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No buts.
